item.description:
SATURDAY, OCTOBER 16, 2010
WOMPATUCK STATE PARK
HINGHAM, MA

RACE DAY SCHEDULE
9:00 am â€“ 10:45 am registration and TShirt pickup. There will be no registration the evening before.

11:00 am start

Post race refreshments and prizes

COURSE DESCRIPTION
The course is a 3.1 mile paved path through the woods of Wompatuck State Park in Hingham, MA. As the leaves of autumn change colors, the course changes and winds its way through the brightly colored forest and rolling hills of the park. The course is protected from the wind and offers shade on extremely sunny days. There is one water stop along the route and more in the finish area. This race will be timed by Yankee Timing.

Proceeds to Benefit the South Shore Charter Public School
www.sscps.org

Adult Pre-Registration Fee $20.00
Postmarked by 9/30/10 or online at
www.coolrunning.com
(registration form attached in "files" section.

Adult Registration Fee $25.00
From 10/01/10 until Race Day

PARKING
There is free parking in lots and on the
road and grounds of the Wompatuck
State Park. Car pools are welcome!

T-shirts guaranteed to the first 150 runners. T-shirt and number pickup at check-in on day of the event.
item.how_to_find_us: We will meet by registration or include in your rsvp if you would like to carpool.
